relation: The Log Filename of this outbound connection.
Is logging enabled for this outbound connection?
The log rotation type for this outbound connection. Logs can be rotated by size, by time, or not at all.
Is the number of log files that can be created for this outbound connection limited?
The Log File Count of this outbound connection.
The Log File Size Limit of this outbound connection.
Should log files for this outbound connection be rotated on startup?
The Log Rotation Directory of this outbound connection.
The Log Time Span of this outbound connection.
The Log Rotation Time of this outbound connection.
